H0.text: In golf, what name is given to a score of three under par on a given hole. Condor

H1.text: In golf, what name is given to a score of three under par on a given hole. Eagle

H2.text: In golf, what name is given to a score of three under par on a given hole. Albatross

H3.text: In golf, what name is given to a score of three under par on a given hole. אלבטרוס

A4.text: A hole score of three strokes fewer than par (three under par, −3) is known as an albatross (the albatross being one of the largest birds); also called a double eagle in the US, e.g.
